definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: On summer evenings the flowers gave forth an almost intoxicating scent.
sentences.chinese: 夏夜，花朵发出几乎醉人的芳香。

sentences.english: But sweet or colour it had stol'n from thee.
sentences.chinese: 有哪种花不偷你的芳香和色泽。

sentences.english: Our goal was to find a fragrance that women and men would associate with youth.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是找到一种让人觉得能永葆青春的芳香。

sentences.english: Thick-lipped urns will sweat in the fragrant cellars.
sentences.chinese: 厚口的瓦罐会在芳香的地窖中流汗。

sentences.english: She leaned on my chest. I could smell the fragrance of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 妻斜靠在我胸部上，我还闻得到她外套上芳香的味道。

sentences.english: Deep violet-red wine, with ripe berry and spicy aromas.
sentences.chinese: 此酒呈深紫红色，散发出成熟浆果和香料的芳香。

sentences.english: A gold-yellow color with nose of white flowers and apricot note.
sentences.chinese: 亮丽的金黄色色泽，带有白色花系银杏的芳香。

sentences.english: Non aromatic blending oils help promote the formation of the second liquid phases.
sentences.chinese: 非芳香性液相掺兑物促进第二液相的形成。

sentences.english: Bouquet: Excellent concentration. Berry nose with vanilla flavours and complex oakiness.
sentences.chinese: 浓醇度，芳香带浓厚果味，有香料和烟的香气。

sentences.english: Get tips for smelling wine aromas in this free video from a wine sommelier.
sentences.chinese: 找闻此免费视频从一个葡萄酒品酒师酒的芳香小技巧。

sentences.english: The button can be filled with different aromatic substances to be made into a children's health care badge.
sentences.chinese: 钮扣本体可充注各种芳香物质和制成儿童保健胸章。
禁用“可分解芳香胺染料”。

sentences.english: The invention relates to various aromatic diacid ester acetal polymers and a synthesis method of the aromatic diacid ester acetal polymers.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及各种芳香二酸酯缩醛聚合物及其合成方法。

sentences.english: There are abundant wild aromatic plant resources in Changbai Mountains, where the climate is temperate.
sentences.chinese: 长白山区属温带气候，野生芳香植物资源十分丰富。

sentences.english: However Pinot Blanc balances between softness and freshness to make the lightest wine in Alsace.
sentences.chinese: 白皮诺比其他阿尔萨斯白葡萄酒芳香味淡点。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
